thread.title: Honest memes, served up spicy (24 Photos)
thread.title_full: Honest memes, served up spicy (24 Photos)

author: John
title: Honest memes, served up spicy (24 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
If you were on theCHIVE’s Instagram a couple years ago you probably noticed something… you likely noted that it sucked. We had about 300,000 followers and we knew we could do better. 
Along came a wiry, 6’3″ bean pole named Edward Stockwell. Recently graduated from the University of Texas, his resume read, “Dog lover, seeker of spicy memes.” Edward quickly put our Instagram back on track . His spicy memes helped theCHIVE soar past 1 million followers on its way to becoming one of the most popular Instagrams in the world. Thanks, Edward. 
More spicy memes on theCHIVE’s Instagram ! 2
